page.title: 15Robert Penn
page.content: My Dad and I were looking, just after lunch at Bem Bom Brothers Funfair, at a huge Roller Coaster, spinning, whirling and and looping around. Just looking at it made me feel sick. It was blue and white with black carriages, somehow my Dad dragged me into the queue and soon I felt myself settling into the carriage. There was no going back now, my heart was beating extremly fast, slowly we ascended the giant iron monster, at the very top were three red flags, for me they spelt out the three minutes of sheer agony, and then we dropped, for one second I felt completely weightless, quickly followed by my stomach shooting backwards then a loop, it felt like I was pressed back in my seat, then at last, along quiet silence, we had stopped, and somehow I was standing up, relieved.
